I just got a new job in finance and need a starter‑pack outfit – classic, timeless pieces that will look professional every day.
Let me pull up your current wardrobe so I can see what classic pieces you already have.

- White dress shirt
- Charcoal trousers (already match the blazer)
- Black leather loafers

**Missing pieces needed for a fully polished look:**
1. A charcoal tailored suit (jacket & matching trousers) – this will give you a seamless suit option for important meetings.
2. A black leather briefcase – essential for a professional appearance and to carry your documents.

I’ll find a few purchase options for those missing items within your budget.

Here are the purchase options for the missing items:
